1. City Council

City Council
============

![Council and Mayor Foyer](https://www.roanoketexas.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=5785)

* 2nd and 4th Tuesdays of each month
* Council Chambers
  500 S. Oak Street
  Roanoke, TX 76262

![David Thompson](https://www.roanoketexas.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=5787)

Members of the City Council are elected for 3-year terms on a nonpartisan basis. The City Council is made up of 7 members, with 2 council members elected from each of the
[city’s 3 wards (PDF)](https://www.roanoketexas.gov/DocumentCenter/View/2120/Roanoke-Ward-Map_2018 "city’s 3 wards ")
and the mayor elected at large.
public input form
